title: gut-rehabbed condo for rent - w/d in unit, stainless, granite, patio
posting_body: I am renting my gut-rehabbed condo in Ravenswood/Lincoln Square beginning September 1, 2022.
The condo has two bedrooms, one is larger than the other and includes a large closet.
The second bedroom would fit a twin bed or could be used for an office/den.
The condo is two blocks from both the Montrose and Damen brown line stops and walking distance to Mariano's, Trader Joe's, and all of the great Lincoln Square restaurants.
The condo will be repainted in a light, neutral color before the next tenant occupies it.
· Granite countertops, cherry cabinets, and stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher, microwave and garbage disposal)
· Modern bathroom with granite and ceramic tile
· French doors that open to private patio (patio furniture comes with unit, if you're interested)
· Landscaping, snow removal, water, etc. included
· Ample, no permit street parking (there is also a covered garage across the street from the unit that rents spaces for $110 per month)
Cats and small dogs are welcome.
One month security deposit and short application required.
Please email with any questions or if you'd like to set up a viewing today!
